persons: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: When we see children play soccer, from scrub fields in Sierra Leone to school fields in Europe or rice fields in Asia, one can see that this simple game has immense qualities. Magical, one might say.
